ds_board_everything.jql: Project in (JBIDE, JBDS, ERT) AND status != Closed ORDER BY Rank ASC

ds_board_everythingelse.description: board for everything else not part of other boards
ds_board_everythingelse.jql: Project in (JBIDE, JBDS, ERT) and not filter=ds_board_assparta and not filter=ds_board_californication and not filter=ds_board_buildnext AND status != Closed ORDER BY Rank ASC

ds_maint_noack.description: issues that are missing ack or nack

ds_master_noack.description: issues that are missing ack or nack

ds_my_freeze.description: Issues assigned or lead by user that is marked for freeze

ds_my_freeze_unresolved.description: Issues assigned or lead by user that is marked for freeze and unresolved

ds_my_latertriage.jql: filter='ds_mystuff' and filter='ds_unresolved' and (project = 'JBIDE' and fixversion in ( %(jbide_bucket_versions)s ) or (project = 'JBDS' and fixversion in ( %(jbds_bucket_versions)s )))

ds_my_needtriage.description: Non triaged stuff that I'm assigned or leading

ds_my_next_maint_unresolved.description: my unresolved work for next maintanence

ds_my_next_master_unresolved.description: my unresolved work for next version

ds_needtriage.jql: fixVersion is empty and filter='ds_unresolved' and project in (JBIDE,JBDS)
